title: Potential application of carduma (Cetengraulis mysticetus) and plumuda (Opisthonema spp.) fish paste for the development of a leberkäse (liver loaf) fish product: Physicochemical and functional properties
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Jairo Humberto López Vargas, Adriana Patricia Muñoz Ramírez, Andrea Paola Rodríguez Triviño, Jesus Simal-Gandara
